pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Production Functions // Estimation of production functions by the Olley-Pakes and Levinsohn-Petrin methodologies. The package aims to reproduce the results obtained with the Stata's user written opreg http://www.stata- journal.com/article.html?article=st0145 and levpet http://www .stata-journal.com/article.html?article=st0060 commands. The first was originally proposed by Olley, G.S. and Pakes, A. (1996) doi:10.2307/2171831. And the second by Levinsohn, J. and Petrin, A. (2003) doi:10.1111/1467-937X.00246.
